recipe.title: Potato Cups For You And Your Cat Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; corn, cooked and chopped ; (175 g)
1 cup ; carrot, cooked and chopped ; (120 g)
½ cup ; shredded mexican cheese blend, or shredded cheddar cheese ; (50 g)

steps.step: NOTE: Cats should only consume these kitty-friendly ingredients in moderation.
In a bowl, mix the mashed potato, peas, corn, carrots, ham and half of the parmesan cheese. Mix well.
Mix the breadcrumbs and remaining parmesan cheese together. Dip each shrimp in egg, then breadcrumbs. Place in a baking tray. Drizzle olive oil on top.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the breadcrumbs turn golden and the prawns are cooked through.
Grease a regular-size muffin mold, and a mini one. Add some of the potato mix until the molds are full.
Using your fingers, mold a hole in the middle of the cups.
Place a whole shrimp in the hole of the regular-size cups. Add half a shrimp to the mini cups.
Add mexican blend cheese (or cheddar) to your cups, and lightly sprinkle the mini cups.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the cheese on top turns golden.
Add sour cream and cilantro to your cups. Sprinkle catnip on your cat’s mini cups.

steps_updated.steps_updated: NOTE: Cats should only consume these kitty-friendly ingredients in moderation.
In a bowl, mix the mashed potato, peas, corn, carrots, ham and half of the parmesan cheese.
Mix the breadcrumbs and remaining parmesan cheese together.
Dip each shrimp in egg, then breadcrumbs.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the breadcrumbs turn golden and the prawns are cooked through.
Grease a regular-size muffin mold, and a mini one.
Add some of the potato mix until the molds are full.
Using your fingers, mold a hole in the middle of the cups.
Place a whole shrimp in the hole of the regular-size cups.
Add half a shrimp to the mini cups.
Add mexican blend cheese (or cheddar) to your cups, and lightly sprinkle the mini cups.
Bake for 10 minutes or until the cheese on top turns golden.
Add sour cream and cilantro to your cups.
Sprinkle catnip on your cat’s mini cups.
